Uses of Interface
socialSecurityDeathIndex.IDatabaseConnection

    • Uses of IDatabaseConnection in socialSecurityDeathIndex

      Classes in socialSecurityDeathIndex that implement IDatabaseConnection 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanDatabaseConnection
      Trivial, in-memory "database".
      Implements IDatabaseConnection to enable testing of methods and algorithms without requiring an actual database connection
      class  DatabaseConnection
      A default implementation of the IDatabaseConnection interface.
      Subclasses inherit from DatabaseConnection to establish a connection to a database from a specific vendor (sponsor).
      These subclasses must implement at least the ConnectToDatabase method.
      class  MySqlDatabaseConnection
      Makes a connection to a MySQL database, using Oracle's com.mysql.jdbc.Driver driver.
      class  SqlServerDatabaseConnection
      Makes a connection to an SQL Server database, using Microsoft's com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver driver.
      Methods in socialSecurityDeathIndex that return IDatabaseConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IDatabaseConnection DatabaseConnection.CreateConnection(java.lang.String sSponsor)
      Create a connection corresponding to the provided sponsor specification
